alert.note: Alert for Amite; Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Pike; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 16 at 3:20PM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures ranging from the low to mid teens along and north of the interstate 10/12 corridor to the low to mid 20s south of the interstate corridor. * WHERE...All of southeastern Louisiana and southern MIssissippi. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Check on the elderly and those who may have insufficient access to heat. Be sure pets have warm shelter and access to fresh water.
